name: Leave me alone (itch) (kraiom)
description:
We made this game for Ludum Dare 42, with the theme  "Running out of space".

It's a game meant to be played in turns by two people. At each step, the tile behind you disappears. The player to get stuck without moves first, loses.

There is also a tutorial in the game with the tile and power up types.

There is also a very simple AI adversary in the game, if you don't have someone else to play with you.

You can move the camera with AWSD or by touching the screen sides.

Ludum dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/leave-me-alone

Ps.: We could't test the Mac and Linux versions! Tell us if there is any issues.

Made by:

Eduardo Pinheiro (https://edugpinheiro.wordpress.com/ - website in PT/BR)

Rafael Tomazela (http://rafaeltomazela.com/)
